name: Motech RadioPlayer
description: An Telegram Bot Maded By Safone to Play Nonstop Radio/Music in Telegram Voice Chats

API_ID.description: api_id part of your Telegram API Key from @MT_MyTelegramOrg_Bot

API_HASH.description: api_hash part of your Telegram API Key from @MT_MyTelegramOrg_Bot

MT_BOT_ID.description: Bot token of Bot, get from @Botfather

MT_SESSION_NAME.description: Session string, use https://replit.com/@CYBERDUDE3/String-Gen-1 to generate pyrogram session string

CHAT.description: ID of Channel or Group where the Bot plays Radio/Music

LOG_GROUP.description: ID of the group to send playlist if CHAT is a Group, if channel then leave blank

ADMINS.description: ID of Users who can use Admin commands (for multiple users seperated by space)

STREAM_ID.description: URL of Radio station to stream when the bot starts
